ValidationRule.description: Prevents anyone except system admin, zone assistants or Operations Delegated Administrators from changing email address.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND (AND (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")) , ISPICKVAL(UserType,"Standard") , NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"Sales Data Steward")) ,NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"Core Zone Administration")),NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"MMS Sales ZSA")),$Profile.Name <>"2008-09 Operations Administration",$Profile.Name <>"2008-09 MMS Hub Manager - DA",$Profile.Name <>"MPSC Profile",$Profile.Name <>"HRS PEO Centric Administration", $Profile.Name <>"Enterprise Support", $Profile.Name <>"HR Essentials", $Profile.Name <>"2008-09 HRS Premier Support - DA",$Profile.Name <>"2008-09 HRS Premier Safety Delegated Admin",$Profile.Name <>"Field Ops Regional Assistant", $Profile.Name <>"PIA Agency Delegated Admin", $Profile.Name <>"Credit Risk Analyst",NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, "HRS Regional Sales Admin")),NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HNBF Sales Administration")),$Profile.Name <>"PEO New Business Delegated Admin",$Profile.Name <>"Sales Enablement"), ISCHANGED( Email))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ** This field can only be changed by the System Administrator, Zone Assistants or Operations Delegated Administrators **
